InstructionData.Title: AV-SETTER
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias O2Relief d0 alias CO2Relief d1 alias N2Relief d2 alias H2Relief d3 alias XRelief d4
alias device r0 #define VENTS -1129453144
move device 0 jal set #move device 1 #jal set #move device 2 #jal set #move device 3 #jal set #move device 4 #jal set s db Setting 3
j end
set: bdns dr0 nodevice s dr0 Mode 1 # bug: do first or it resets! s dr0 PressureInternal 250 s dr0 PressureExternal 0 s dr0 On 1 nodevice: j ra end:
